title: Non-perturbative Enhanced Gauge Symmetries in the Gimon-Polchinski Orientifold
abstract: We study the enhanced gauge symmetries at constant couplings in the moduli space of the Gimon-Polchinski Orientifold. We show that whenever there is a singularity of E_6, E_7 and E_8 type we get enhanced gauge symmetry U(5), U(6) and U(8) respectively. This is due to the additional twisting involved in the definition of the Gimon-Polchiniski orientifold.
